title: Leeds United target Jaka Bijol
description: Leeds United are interested in signing Jaka Bijol from Udinese in the summer transfer window, according to journalist Marco Conterio. The reporter has claimed that Bijol is currently one of the ‘hottest names’ on the list of the West Yorkshire club. Udinese are willing to sell Bijol this summer, but the Italian club are looking […] The post Leeds United target Jaka Bijol appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Jamie Jones

title: Manchester United ‘going all out for Viktor Gyokeres’
description: Manchester United are determined to sign Viktor Gyokeres from Sporting CP in the summer transfer window, according to Fichajes. The report has claimed that Man United are ready to offer £60million for the Sweden international striker, with manager Ruben Amorim personally keen on bringing the striker to Old Trafford. author: Jamie Jones
